forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. West northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Freezing Rain then Light Snow Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 11pm, then freezing rain and rain between 11pm and 3am, then snow likely and freezing rain likely. Cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails closed for the day. We will clean up the trails following this weather event.
nubsNob.comments:
Nub's Nob is Closed today due to a widespread power outage. Following the storm we will have some major tree debris to clean-up. 

Please check back to our website in the morning for an update on when we will be able to open.

The last scheduled day of the season is April 6.
